indexer.api.server.service

Interface IndexService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexServiceImpl

    public interface IndexService
    Author:
    lion A suitable interface to get access at database and store data it is used by DatabaseIndexer

    • Method Detail

      • createOrUpdateIndex

        void createOrUpdateIndex(java.lang.String word,
                         java.lang.String url,
                         java.lang.String pageTitle,
                         int matches)
        Create or Update a indexed word on database
        Parameters:
        word - to be updated or create
        url - the url where was found
        pageTitle - the title of that webpage
        matches - the amount of coincidences founds

      • search

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<WebPage> search(java.lang.String query,
                                                     org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
                                              throws IndexerNotMatchesException
        Execute a search against Database
        Parameters:
        query - the word to be find
        page - A convenient object provided by Spring JPA to make pagination on models
        Returns:
        a Pagination object, with pageNumber, totalPages, totalElements, etc
        Throws:
        IndexerNotMatchesException - throw if no matches were found
